caption.p: Irritability evaluation using the HET-CAM assay for basil hydro-alcoholic extracts (OBAE and OBHE, in concentration of 150 µg/mL) and control samples (water, SLS and DMSO 0.5%); images represent the CAM area of administration before sample application ( t 0 ) and five minutes after application ( t 5 ), by stereomicroscopy, magnification × 2.
